next_steps.note: "Brainstorm 5-10 potential themes or subjects for the poetry (e.g., nature, loss, joy, city life, abstract concepts). Add these to the 'Ideas' list.",
"Research and select 3-5 poets whose style resonates with your vision for this project. Note key stylistic elements to potentially emulate or contrast.",
"Write a first draft of at least one poem, focusing on free verse and experimentation with imagery. Add this to 'Progress' when complete.",
"Define specific criteria for 'done' for each poem (e.g., length, use of specific poetic devices, emotional impact). This will help with editing.",
